oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Melvin Friestadt interviews Ernest Tubb -- Ernest Tubb tribute to Eva Foley
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Melvin Friestadt delivers a short message to Jim Evans before an interview with Ernest Tubb (conducted by Melvin Friestadt) backstage at the Opry. Followed by a tribute to Eva Foley by Ernest Tubb, likely while on stage at the Opry, who passed away that day (November 17, 1951). The interview with Melvin Friestadt may or may not have been recorded on that same date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Melvin Friestadt talks -- Melvin Friestadt interviews Ernest Tubb -- Ernest Tubb talks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Martin, Judy, 1918-1951;
